languages.text: "Номос нуждаются в общении. В познании. В движении. Магос Паскаль велел нам не говорить ни с кем, кроме него и тебя, это печально. Но мы хотя бы можем наблюдать".

traits.locale_text: "Номос нуждается в общении. В познании. В движении. Магос Паскаль велел нам не говорить ни с кем кроме него и тебя, это печально. Но мы хотя бы можем наблюдать".

languages.text: "Nomos require communication. Knowledge. Movement. Magos Pasqal compelled us not to speak with anyone other than him or you. It is disappointing. But at least we can observe."
languages.original_text: "Номос нуждаются в общении. В познании. В движении. Магос Паскаль велел нам не говорить ни с кем, кроме него и тебя, это печально. Но мы хотя бы можем наблюдать".

traits.locale_text: "Nomos require communication. In knowledge. In movement. Magos Pasqal compelled us not to speak with anyone other than him and you. It is disappointing. But at least we can observe."
"Nomos require communication. Learning. Movement. Magos Pasqal compelled us not to speak with anyone other than him and you. It is disappointing. But at least we can observe."
"Nomos require communication. In knowledge. In movement. Magos Pasqal compelled us not to speak with anyone other than him and you. It is disappointing. But at least we can observe."
"Nomos require communication. In knowledge. In movement. Magos Pasqal compelled us not to speak with anyone other than him and you. It is disappointing. But at least we can observe."
"Nomos require communication. In knowledge. In movement. Magos Pasqal compelled us not to speak with anyone other than him or you. It is disappointing. But at least we can observe."
"Nomos require communication. In knowledge. In movement. Magos Pasqal compelled us not to speak with anyone other than him or you. It is disappointing. But at least we can observe."
"Nomos require communication. Knowledge. Movement. Magos Pasqal compelled us not to speak with anyone other than him or you. It is disappointing. But at least we can observe."

languages.text: « Nous avons besoin de communiquer. La connaissance. Le mouvement... Le magos Pasqal nous a ordonné de ne parler à personne d'autre que lui-même ou vous. C'est décevant, mais au moins pouvons-nous observer. »
languages.original_text: "Nomos require communication. Knowledge. Movement. Magos Pasqal compelled us not to speak with anyone other than him or you. It is disappointing. But at least we can observe."

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons besoin de communiquer. Pour la connaissance, pour le mouvement. Le magos Pasqal nous a ordonné de ne parler à personne d'autre que lui-même et vous. C'est une déception, mais au moins pouvons-nous observer. »

languages.text: “诺莫斯需要沟通，通过知识，通过行动。贤者帕斯卡只允许我与你和他说话。诺莫斯很失望，但至少我们还可以观察。”
languages.original_text: "Nomos require communication. Knowledge. Movement. Magos Pasqal compelled us not to speak with anyone other than him or you. It is disappointing. But at least we can observe."

traits.locale_text: “诺莫斯需要沟通。通过知识，通过行动。贤者帕斯卡只允许我与你和他说话。诺莫斯很失望，但至少我们可以观察。”

languages.text: "Nomos benötigen Kommunikation. Wissen. Bewegung. Magos Pasqal hat uns genötigt, mit niemandem als ihm und Euch zu sprechen. Es ist enttäuschend. Doch zumindest können wir beobachten."
languages.original_text: "Nomos require communication. Knowledge. Movement. Magos Pasqal compelled us not to speak with anyone other than him or you. It is disappointing. But at least we can observe."

traits.locale_text: "Nomos benötigen Kommunikation. Im Wissen. In der Bewegung. Magos Pasqal hat uns genötigt, mit niemandem als ihm und Euch zu sprechen. Es ist enttäuschend. Doch zumindest können wir beobachten."

languages.text: «Nomos requiere comunicación. Conocimiento. Movimiento. El Magos Pasqal nos prohibió hablar con nadie que no fueran él o usted. Es decepcionante. Pero al menos podemos observar».
languages.original_text: "Nomos require communication. Knowledge. Movement. Magos Pasqal compelled us not to speak with anyone other than him or you. It is disappointing. But at least we can observe."

traits.locale_text: «Nomos requiere comunicación. Sobre conocimiento. Sobre movimiento. El magos Pasqal nos prohibió hablar con nadie que no fuera él o usted. Es decepcionante. Pero al menos podemos observar».

languages.text: 「ノモスはコミュニケーションを必要とする。知識や動きを通じて得なければならない。マゴス・パスカルの命令で、彼とあなた以外の人とは話さないことになっている。残念なことだ。しかし、少なくとも観察することはできる」
languages.original_text: "Nomos require communication. Knowledge. Movement. Magos Pasqal compelled us not to speak with anyone other than him or you. It is disappointing. But at least we can observe."

traits.locale_text: 「ノモスはコミュニケーションを必要とする。知識や動きを通じて得なければならない。マゴス・パスカルの命令で、彼とあなた以外の人とは話さないことになっている。残念なことだ。しかし、少なくとも観察することはできる」

languages.text: "Nomos iletişim ister. Bilgi... Hareket... Magos Pasqal, bizi kendisi ve sizden başka kimseyle konuşmamaya mecbur kıldı. Heves kırsa da gözlem yapabiliyoruz."
languages.original_text: "Nomos require communication. Knowledge. Movement. Magos Pasqal compelled us not to speak with anyone other than him or you. It is disappointing. But at least we can observe."

traits.locale_text: "Nomos iletişim ister. Bilgi... Hareket... Magos Pasqal, bizi kendisi veya sizden başka kimseyle konuşmamaya mecbur etti. Heves kırsa da gözlem yapabiliyoruz."
